ability.name: Stench
ability.effect: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

ability.name: Drizzle
ability.effect: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

ability.name: Speed Boost
ability.effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

ability.name: Battle Armor
ability.effect: Protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

ability.name: Sturdy
ability.effect: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

ability.name: Damp
ability.effect: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

ability.name: Sand Veil
ability.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

ability.name: Static
ability.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may cause the paralysis.

ability.name: Volt Absorb
ability.effect: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

ability.name: Water Absorb
ability.effect: Restores HP if hit by an Water-type move.

ability.name: Oblivious
ability.effect: Keeps the Pokémon from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
